description: RxClass drug classifications for all prescribable products from NLM RxNav byRxcui API

processing_notes.method: Distributed processing using Spark mapPartitions - each worker processes partition of drugs in parallel
processing_notes.rate_limiting: 0.6s delay per API call to comply with NLM 20 req/sec per IP limit (10 workers share same NAT Gateway IP)
processing_notes.api_compliance: 10 workers Ã— 1.67 req/sec = 16.7 req/sec total (safe buffer under 20 req/sec limit)
processing_notes.data_format: JSON API responses - each drug returns ALL class relationships in single call
processing_notes.parallelization: 10 workers (large), ~2,100 drugs per worker for 21k total products
processing_notes.estimated_runtime: 21 minutes wall time (vs 25 min class-first incomplete approach)
